sentences.en: As a scientist, his influence was immense.
sentences.cn: 身为一名科学家，他的影响力极大。

sentences.en: He denies exerting any political influence over them.
sentences.cn: 他否认曾向他们施加过政治影响。

sentences.en: He used his influence to get his son into medical school.
sentences.cn: 他利用权势把儿子弄进了医学院。

sentences.en: He was a major influence in converting Godwin to political radicalism.
sentences.cn: 戈德温变成政治激进主义者主要是受他的影响。

sentences.en: He was arrested on suspicion of driving under the influence of alcohol.
sentences.cn: 他因涉嫌酒后驾驶被捕。

sentences.en: I did what I could, but her mother's influence was pernicious.
sentences.cn: 我已尽力了，但是她母亲贻害颇深。

sentences.en: I fell under the influence of a history master.
sentences.cn: 我当时深受一位历史老师的影响。

sentences.en: I thought Sue would be a good influence on you.
sentences.cn: 我认为苏能对你产生良好影响。

sentences.en: It might give the Commission undue influence over the coming negotiations.
sentences.cn: 这可能会在即将开启的谈判问题上给委员会带来过多的影响。

sentences.en: Its influence can make you view life through rose-coloured glasses.
sentences.cn: 它会让人以过于乐观的态度看待生活。

sentences.en: Many other medications have an influence on cholesterol levels.
sentences.cn: 许多其他的药物治疗对胆固醇水平都有一定的影响。

sentences.en: Marx was strongly influenced by the historian Niebuhr.
sentences.cn: 马克思深受历史学家尼布尔的影响。

sentences.en: Political influence is being used to shape public opinion and isolate critics.
sentences.cn: 政治影响正被用来左右公众舆论，使批评家们陷于孤立。

sentences.en: Some, I suppose, might even be in positions to influence opinion.
sentences.cn: 有的人，我认为，甚至有可能影响舆论。

sentences.en: Teenage idols have a strong influence on our children.
sentences.cn: 青少年偶像对孩子们的影响非常深。

sentences.en: The boss retains enormous influence by reason of his position.
sentences.cn: 老板由于自身的地位而一直有极大的影响力。

sentences.en: The Shropshire landscape was an influence on Owen too.
sentences.cn: 什罗普郡的风景也对欧文产生了影响。

sentences.en: Van Gogh had a major influence on the development of modern painting.
sentences.cn: 凡·高对现代绘画的发展有着重大影响。

sentences.en: You need to understand how office politics influence the working environment.
sentences.cn: 你需要了解办公室权术是如何影响工作氛围的。

words.tran_cn: 影响；势力；感化；有影响的人或事

phrases.tran_cn: 外部影响；外来因素；外界影响
n. 影响因素；电话干扰系数
不利影响；消极作用；负影响
喝醉了酒：醉酒，尤指酒精导致
n. 不正当影响；[律]不正当压力

trans.tran_cn: 势力，影响，有影响的人/事物
trans.tran_en: the power to affect the way someone or something develops, behaves, or thinks, without using direct force or orders
the power to affect the way someone or something develops, behaves, or thinks, without using direct force or orders
to affect the way someone or something develops, behaves, thinks etc without directly forcing or ordering them
the power to affect the way someone or something develops, behaves, or thinks, without using direct force or orders
to affect the way someone or something develops, behaves, thinks etc without directly forcing or ordering them
